trans-unit.source: Windows Containers

trans-unit.source: Hey!
trans-unit.target: Hey!

trans-unit.source: This is a test update to see if this update will get include in the HO creation.
trans-unit.target: This is a test update to see if this update will get include in the HO creation.

trans-unit.source: Windows containers provide operating system level virtualization that allow you to run multiple isolated applications on one container host.
trans-unit.target: Windows containers provide operating system level virtualization that allow you to run multiple isolated applications on one container host.

trans-unit.source: The following table list topics that provide more information about Windows containers, a guided quick start so that you can try out Windows containers, and additional resources.
trans-unit.target: The following table list topics that provide more information about Windows containers, a guided quick start so that you can try out Windows containers, and additional resources.

trans-unit.source: Get started with Windows Containers
trans-unit.target: Get started with Windows Containers

trans-unit.source: The following resources will walk you through the deployment, creation, and simple management of Windows Containers.
trans-unit.target: The following resources will walk you through the deployment, creation, and simple management of Windows Containers.
